plugins.name: LARA
plugins.description:
LARA® For Figma provides access to an auto-generated searchable library of your approved promotional material that automatically identifies claims.

Keep historical brand knowledge in one place to easily find exactly the language you're looking for.

LARA® can be seamlessly updated as you get new content approved, cutting out the need to manually update a catalog.

Keep your data safe and secure in the cloud instead of in someone's head or filing cabinet.


*Subscription is required to log into the plug-in. Please contact the Lithero team for more information at https://lithero.com/

plugins.name: SVG Stroke Thickness Editor
plugins.description:
이 플러그인을 이용하면 아이콘 테두리의 두께를 일괄적으로 쉽게 변경할 수 있습니다. 깔끔한 디자인 시스템을 유지하는 데 도움이 됩니다.


• 테두리 두께의 일관성을 확인합니다.

• 일괄적으로 테두리 두께를 수정 할 수 있습니다.

• 컴포넌트 및 인스턴스와 함께 작동합니다.

• 테두리 두께를 어떻게 조정할지에 대해 세 가지 옵션 중에서 선택할 수 있습니다.


이 플러그인은 아직도 작업이 진행 중인 프로젝트입니다. 댓글과 피드백은 환영입니다!


-------------


This plugin helps you batch change icon stroke sizes so that you can maintain consistency and don't have to do it manually. Helps in maintaining a clean design system.


  1. Check for stroke size consistency.
  2. Batch change stroke sizes.
  3. Works with components and instances.
  4. Chose from 3 options as to how you want to scale your stroke sizes.


This is a work in progress. Any comments and feedback would be appreciated.

accepted.name: Ash J
accepted.description:
Hello / 안녕하세요~
Product Designer / 프로덕트 디자이너

plugins.tagline: Batch change icon stroke sizes.

plugins.name: Chroma Forge
plugins.description:
Chroma Forge for Figma


A powerful color selection plugin for Figma that provides an intuitive color wheel and advanced color harmony tools to create consistent color palettes.


Features


Interactive Color Wheel

  1. High-precision color selection with a fully interactive color wheel
  2. Adjustable brightness and saturation sliders
  3. Real-time color preview
  4. HEX code input with validation


Color Harmony Tools

  1. Create cohesive color palettes using different harmony types:
  2. Analogous: Colors that are adjacent to each other on the color wheel
  3. Triad: Three colors evenly spaced around the color wheel
  4. Complementary: Colors opposite each other on the color wheel
  5. Split Complementary: A main color and two colors adjacent to its complement
  6. Square: Four colors evenly spaced around the color wheel
  7. Compound: A combination of complementary and analogous harmonies
  8. Mono: A single color with various shades
  9. Custom: Create your own custom harmony by placing markers freely


Flexible Color Selection

  1. Select 2-6 colors at once (depending on harmony type)
  2. Drag markers on the wheel to fine-tune your color selection
  3. Automatic contrast adjustment for optimal visibility


Figma Integration

  1. Apply selected colors directly to selected elements
  2. Create color styles from your palette
  3. Generate color variables with automatic shade variants (10% to 100% brightness)
  4. Intelligent naming system for organizing colors


How to Use


Select a Harmony Type: Choose from the dropdown menu to define how colors relate to each other

Select Number of Colors: Choose how many colors you want in your palette (2-6)

Choose Your Base Color: Click and drag on the color wheel or enter a HEX code

Adjust Saturation and Brightness: Use the sliders to fine-tune your colors

Apply Colors: Use the buttons to:

  1. Apply directly to selected elements
  2. Add to Figma color styles
  3. Add to Figma variables (with automatic shade creation)


Email me

Behance

Dribbble

LinkedIn

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Create perfect palettes with color harmony tools

plugins.name: Dummy datazer
plugins.description:
The Dummy datazer plugin enhances your Figma design workflow by allowing you to replace text in selected text layers with randomly generated data. With this plugin, you can effortlessly populate your designs with realistic placeholders, including:


- Full Names : Choose from a diverse list of 100 full names.

- Company Names : Select from 50 company names.

- Addresses : Utilize 50 unique addresses for location-based designs.

- Phone Numbers : Insert 50 different phone numbers for contact information.

Simply select the text layers you wish to update, choose the type of data you want to insert, and let the plugin do the rest. The Dummy datazer ensures your designs are filled with dynamic and varied content, perfect for mockups and testing scenarios.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Populate Your Designs with Dynamic Data

plugins.name: Class Action
plugins.description:
Class Action is a powerful CSS-like styling tool that revolutionizes how designers work with consistent design tokens and variables in Figma. Create Tailwind-inspired class libraries, UI kits, and design templates with ease, then apply saved styles instantly to other frames with a single click.


Key features:

  1. Create and manage reusable style classes similar to CSS and Tailwind classes
  2. Build and apply complete UI kits and design templates across multiple frames
  3. Preserve Figma variables, color tokens, and style references in your templates
  4. Full support for Tailwind-like utility classes, component styles, and design tokens
  5. Premium version with unlimited style classes and advanced template management


Class Action brings CSS and Tailwind-inspired workflows to Figma by eliminating repetitive styling tasks. Perfect for design systems, UI kit creation, template libraries, and maintaining visual consistency across projects. Save time, reduce styling errors, and keep your designs perfectly aligned with your component library or Tailwind-like system.


Compatible with both light and dark Figma themes, supports variable tokens for responsive templates, and optimized for performance even in large UI kit files with complex component libraries.
plugins.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

140225.name: Class Action
140225.description:
Class Action is a powerful CSS-like styling tool that revolutionizes how designers work with consistent design tokens and variables in Figma. Create Tailwind-inspired class libraries, UI kits, and design templates with ease, then apply saved styles instantly to other frames with a single click.

  2. Build and apply complete UI kits and design templates across multiple frames
  3. Preserve Figma variables, color tokens, and style references in your templates
  4. Full support for Tailwind-like utility classes, component styles, and design tokens
  5. Premium version with unlimited style classes and advanced template management


Class Action brings CSS and Tailwind-inspired workflows to Figma by eliminating repetitive styling tasks. Perfect for design systems, UI kit creation, template libraries, and maintaining visual consistency across projects. Save time, reduce styling errors, and keep your designs perfectly aligned with your component library or Tailwind-like system.


Compatible with both light and dark Figma themes, supports variable tokens for responsive templates, and optimized for performance even in large UI kit files with complex component libraries.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs to communicate with the Lemon Squeezy API for license validation and activation.

140225.release_notes:
This maintenance update fixes a class positioning issue that ensures classes maintain their correct order when updated, providing a more reliable user experience.

New in this release:

• Class Update Position Fix: Resolved issue where updating a class would cause it to move to the bottom of the list instead of maintaining its original position in the custom order
This update ensures that your carefully organized class list stays exactly as you arranged it, even when making updates to individual classes.
140225.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

plugins.name: Publish Ninja - Publish websites directly from Figma
plugins.description:
Turn your designs into live websites directly from Figma!

With Publish Ninja, you can instantly turn your Figma designs into fully functional, responsive websites directly from Figma.


🎉 Try it free! - We offer a 7-day free trial so you can experience publishing directly from Figma.


Why use Publish Ninja?

You’ve designed a website in Figma, but now you’re stuck. Either you need a developer, or you have to wrestle with complicated website builders. It’s frustrating, time-consuming, and slows you down.


Publish Ninja lets you publish fully responsive websites directly from Figma—no coding needed. With just a few clicks, your design goes live as a website.


⚡ How it Works

  1. Design in Figma – Create your site just like any other Figma project.
  2. Customize responsiveness – Easily adjust layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
  3. Publish instantly – One click, and your website is live!


🔥 Why Choose Publish Ninja?


✅ No-Code website builder – No technical skills required.

✅ Live in seconds – Skip the hassle of exporting and coding.

✅ Custom domains – Publish on your own domain with ease.

✅ SEO-optimized – Built-in performance & search engine best practices.

plugins.name: Inflo-UX
plugins.description:
Introducing InFlo-UX – the prototype plugin for Figma (Adobe XD and Sketch to follow) that transforms your document content index into an interactive prototype.

InFlo-UX seamlessly ingests content index documents of all kinds, automatically creating numbered and labeled frames, all while retaining the project name, section titles, and page numbers.


Ideal for agencies and designers looking to streamline workflows,

InFlo-UX accelerates your design process by turning static content into an interactive, organized prototype with just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: From Index to UX

plugins.name: MultiText Inserter
plugins.description:
MultiText Inserter helps you quickly create multiple text fields in your designs all at once. Instead of adding each text box one by one, you can enter all your text at once, set the font size, color, and style, and the plugin will generate all the text fields for you automatically. It's a real time-saver for designers who need to add lists of text elements.


Example of Footer Content:


"About Us"

"Contact"

"Privacy Policy"

"Terms of Service"

"© 2023 Your Company Name"

You can input these lines into the plugin, and it will create individual text fields for each item, styled according to your settings.

plugins.name: Collect and Rename
plugins.description:
Collect and Rename allows users to easily collect text elements from a design document, rename them, and navigate to specific layers on different pages.


Main features:


1. Collection of text elements:

- The plugin automatically collects all text elements in the document.

2. Renaming texts:

- Ability to rename text layers directly in the plugin interface.

- After renaming, text layers are updated in real time.

3. Layer navigation:

- Ability to navigate to a specific layer, even if it is on a different page of the document.



How to use the plugin:


1. Installation and launch:

- Install the "Collect and Rename" plugin from the Figma Community.

- Open your project in Figma and launch the plugin through the "Plugins" menu.

2. Text collection:

- The plugin will automatically collect all text elements from the current document and display them in the interface.

3. Renaming texts:

- In the plugin interface, you will see a list of all text layers.

- For each text element:

- "Current text" shows the current text of the layer.

- "New text" provides a field for entering new text.

- Enter the new text in the "New text" field and press "Apply" or the Enter key to confirm.

- The layer text will be updated, and you will see a notification about a successful update.

4. Navigation to layers:

- Click on the text field of the layer to automatically navigate to it in the document, even if it is on a different page.

5. Closing the plugin:

- Close the plugin when you finish your work by pressing the "Close" button in the plugin interface.
plugins.tagline: The plugin shows all text layers in a list, making it easy to replace text.

plugins.name: ChatD2C
plugins.description:
智能前端生成助手是一款将设计稿快速转为前端代码的产品。


解决问题：降低设计与开发沟通协作成本、减少前端编码工作、沉淀标准组件、支持多个前端框架


支持一键转前端代码：

plugins.name: Crosshatch Image Effect Generator
plugins.description:
Create beautiful crosshatch artwork from any photograph with our powerful image transformation tool.


Key Features:

  1. Real-time preview - See changes instantly as you adjust settings
  2. Settings controls - Fine-tune density, line thickness, contrast, and layering
  3. Multiple presets - Choose from curated image collections or upload your own


Perfect for graphic designers creating vintage-style artwork, artists exploring digital techniques, social media content creators, and anyone who wants to transform ordinary photos into extraordinary hand-drawn illustrations.


Use Case Examples

  1. Convert portraits into classic sketch-style artwork
  2. Create vintage-style illustrations for branding
  3. Transform landscapes into artistic prints
  4. Generate unique social media content
  5. Design book illustrations and editorial art

plugins.name: Vertical Trim Cap Height Scanner
plugins.description:
This plugin makes it easy to find text that has had "Cap Height to baseline" vertical trim applied with the click of a button.

It's a useful tool to find and fix incorrectly applied text trims.


How to use:

  1. Click the button on the page you want to search.
  2. Click on trimmed text to select it and modify manually.
  3. Click the button again to confirm the text no longer appears in results.


Tips for fixes:

  1. Be careful when changing trim settings to "Standard" as it may cause layout shifts.
  2. Start by fixing text with the "Main component" tag first.


日本語訳

ボタンをクリックするだけで、上下トリミングに「ベースラインまでのキャップハイト」が設定されているテキストを見つけることができます。

誤って上下トリミングを設定してしまった時に便利なツールです。


使い方：

  1. 検索したいページでボタンをクリックします。
  2. トリミングが設定されたテキストをクリックし、手動で修正します。
  3. 再度ボタンをクリックし、検索結果に表示されなくなったことを確認します。


修正時のコツ：

  1. トリミングを標準に変更するとレイアウトシフトが発生するので、慎重に修正しましょう。
  2. 「メインコンポーネント」タグのついたテキストから先に修正するのがおすすめです。
plugins.tagline: Search for text with "Cap height to baseline" set for vertical trim

131197.name: Vertical Trim Cap Height Scanner
131197.description:
This plugin makes it easy to find text that has had "Cap Height to baseline" vertical trim applied with the click of a button.

It's a useful tool to find and fix incorrectly applied text trims.


How to use:

  1. Click the button on the page you want to search.
  2. Click on trimmed text to select it and modify manually.
  3. Click the button again to confirm the text no longer appears in results.


Tips for fixes:

  1. Be careful when changing trim settings to "Standard" as it may cause layout shifts.
  2. Start by fixing text with the "Main component" tag first.

  2. 「メインコンポーネント」タグのついたテキストから先に修正するのがおすすめです。

plugins.name: Text to Frame Name
plugins.description:
The Figma plugin “Text to Frame Name” is a handy tool that allows you to replace selected text with the name of the highest-level frame it belongs to, all at once. This is particularly useful for page numbers in presentation materials or proposals. For example, you can set frame names with sequential numbers like “01,” “02,” and “03,” place temporary text (e.g., “00”) on each page, select all the text, and run this plugin to complete page numbering. Even if you reorder or add pages, you can easily reset the numbers by simply modifying the frame names. This eliminates the need for manual number adjustments, significantly improving workflow efficiency.


Figmaプラグイン「Text to Frame Name」は、選択したテキストを、それぞれが属する最上位のフレーム名に一括で置き換えることができる便利なツールです。主にプレゼンテーション資料や提案書などのページ番号で役立ちます。たとえば「01」「02」「03」など連番がついたフレーム名にしておき、各ページに仮のテキスト（例：00）を配置し、すべてのテキストを選択してこのプラグインを実行するだけで、ページ番号制作が完了します。ページを入れ替えたり追加したりしても、フレーム名さえ修正すれば簡単に番号を再設定可能。手動で番号を修正する必要がなくなり、作業効率が大きく向上します。
plugins.tagline: Auto-convert text layers to parent frame names

130123.name: Text to Frame Name
130123.description:

plugins.name: Layer Sweeper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly organize and declutter your design files with the "Layer Sweeper" plugin.


This plugin scans your entire file to identify and delete hidden layers, frames, and groups while respecting locked layers and hidden layers within master components. Streamline your workflow, optimize file performance, and maintain a clean, professional design environment with ease. Perfect for keeping your Figma files organized and efficient.


If you have any suggestions or inquiries, feel free to reach out to me on Twitter.


If you appreciate my work, consider showing your support by buying me a coffee.
plugins.tagline: Remove hidden layers with a single click.

116091.description:

plugins.name: Rename From Sublayer
plugins.description:
Rename from sublayers simplifies the process of renaming groups in Figma by automatically detecting image, text or shape layers within selected groups.


You can choose between five modes: image detection, text layer, Rectangle layer, ellipse layer and symbols detection.

Additionally, you can opt to rename all child groups within the hierarchy or just the top-level group, giving you full control over your naming conventions.


Key Features:

  1. Image, Text, Shape Detection: Automatically rename groups based on image names, text names, rectangle names, ellipse names and symbols.
  2. Selective Renaming: Choose to rename just the highest-level group or all nested child groups.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI to quickly toggle between options.


Whether you're managing large design systems or working on a small project, Rename from sublayers helps keep your layers organized and your workflow efficient.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly rename groups by image, text or shape layers.

116202.name: Rename From Sublayer
116202.description:
Rename from sublayers simplifies the process of renaming groups in Figma by automatically detecting image, text or shape layers within selected groups.


You can choose between five modes: image detection, text layer, Rectangle layer, ellipse layer and symbols detection.

Additionally, you can opt to rename all child groups within the hierarchy or just the top-level group, giving you full control over your naming conventions.


Key Features:

  1. Image, Text, Shape Detection: Automatically rename groups based on image names, text names, rectangle names, ellipse names and symbols.
  2. Selective Renaming: Choose to rename just the highest-level group or all nested child groups.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI to quickly toggle between options.


Whether you're managing large design systems or working on a small project, Rename from sublayers helps keep your layers organized and your workflow efficient.
116202.tagline: Effortlessly rename groups by image, text or shape layers.

plugins.name: FigSheet - Excel & Google Sheets Viewer/Editor
plugins.description:
📊 Figma에서 스프레드시트를 바로 확인하세요!


🚀 핵심 기능

• URL 연동: Google Sheets, Excel Online을 URL로 바로 불러오기

• 파일 업로드: CSV, Excel 파일을 drag & drop으로 즉시 확인

• 편집/보기 모드: 필요에 따라 실시간 편집 또는 읽기 전용 모드 선택

• 데이터 내보내기: CSV 다운로드, 클립보드 복사로 데이터 활용


🎯 차별화 포인트

✅ 국내 유일 완전 한국어 지원 스프레드시트 뷰어

✅ URL + 로컬 파일 두 방식 모두 지원하는 올인원 솔루션

✅ 드래그 앤 드롭으로 3초 만에 파일 확인

✅ 10MB까지 대용량 Excel 파일 처리 가능


💼 활용 사례

• 실제 데이터로 테이블/차트 디자인 작업

• 기획자 스펙 시트를 실시간으로 참조

• 클라이언트 제공 데이터를 즉시 검토

• Figma를 벗어나지 않고 모든 데이터 작업 완료


Figma에서 더 이상 창을 전환하지 마세요. FigSheet로 모든 데이터를 한 곳에서! 🚀


📊 View spreadsheets directly in Figma without switching tabs!


🚀 Key Features

• URL Integration: Load Google Sheets & Excel Online instantly with URLs

• File Upload: Drag & drop CSV, Excel files for immediate preview

• Edit/View Modes: Switch between real-time editing and read-only viewing

• Data Export: Download as CSV or copy to clipboard for easy data transfer


🎯 What Makes Us Different

✅ Only plugin supporting BOTH URL linking AND local file upload

✅ Drag & drop functionality - preview files in 3 seconds

✅ Handle large Excel files up to 10MB with advanced parsing

✅ Complete Korean language support for Korean designers


💼 Perfect For

• Design with real data instead of lorem ipsum

• Reference spec sheets from product managers in real-time

• Review client data files instantly without leaving Figma

• Build prototypes with actual spreadsheet content


🌟 Why Choose FigSheet?

Most spreadsheet plugins only support URLs OR files - we support BOTH! Plus our intuitive drag & drop interface and robust error handling make data integration seamless.


Stop switching between apps. Keep everything in Figma with FigSheet! 🚀
plugins.tagline: spreadsheet, excel, data

plugins.name: Magic Renamer AI - With Design Token mode
plugins.description:
Magic Renamer AI is a Figma plugin that lets you automatically rename all your layers in one click (up to 120 layers at once, with design token support).


With AI, it suggests clear and consistent names that follow design and design system best practices.


🔥Key features:


  1. Smart, instant renaming: The AI analyzes your file and suggests relevant names for each layer.
  2. Time-saving: No more manual renaming—everything is done in seconds, even for large files.
  3. Clarity and consistency: Naming conventions are enforced, making teamwork easier.
  4. Simple interface: One-click use, no complicated setup. Advanced options are available if you need them.
  5. Design token support: Perfect for solo or teams using advanced design systems.
  6. Custom API support: Use your own API key (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Perplexity, or OpenRouter) for more control.


💡 Why choose Magic Renamer AI?

Unlike other plugins, Magic Renamer AI uses artificial intelligence to understand the context of each layer and suggest names tailored to your project. It ensures consistency, reduces errors, and fits seamlessly into your Figma workflow. It’s the perfect tool to save time, improve file quality, and speed up your design process.
plugins.tagline: AI-powered batch renaming for Layers — up to 120 at once -> Clarity | Consistency

plugins.name: Usably
plugins.description:
Usably: Instant UX Feedback Powered by AI


Get actionable insights to improve usability, accessibility, and visual consistency—all without needing an API key!


This plugin analyzes your design against core UX principles like Hick's Law, Jakob's Law, and more.


How It Works:

  1. Select an area: Choose a single frame or an entire flow with multiple frames.
  2. Click "Review Design": Start the analysis with just one click.
  3. Get feedback: Usably generates comprehensive, actionable feedback to refine your design.


Key Features:

✅ Easy setup: NO API key needed - Install the plugin, sign up with your email, and start reviewing in seconds.

✅ Advanced UX analysis: Incorporates proven UX laws for better design decisions.


The subscription and payment of the plugin is managed by Figma marketplace. You can follow their help center to unsubscribe.


🦄 Free plan includes 5 reviews, paid subscription includes 100 reviews per month.


💌 Need help? Reach out to the Usably team at usably.team@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: AI-powered UX reviews with insights—no API key needed. Install and start improving your designs!

plugins.name: Figma to Rocketium
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma designs into Rocketium-ready assets with our specialized export plugin built for designers who need seamless integration between Figma and Rocketium, this plugin intelligently handles variants and ensures compatibility.


Key Features:

  1. One-click authentication with Rocketium
  2. Smart variant detection and grouping
  3. Automatic compatibility validation
  4. Size consistency checks across variants
  5. Clear warning system for unsupported features
plugins.tagline: Figma designs to Rocketium: Auto convert with variant detection & compatibility checks

140121.description:

140121.tagline: Figma designs to Rocketium: Auto convert with variant detection & compatibility checks

plugins.name: MultiDesign Assistant
plugins.description:
MultiDesign Assistant 是一款多功能設計輔助工具，能提升 Figma 的工作效率。這個插件提供了四個實用功能：


一鍵交換填充和描邊顏色：快速切換物件的填充和描邊顏色，節省設計時間。

快速調整尺寸：輸入具體數值，一鍵調整物件的長度和寬度。

等比縮小：通過輸入自定義比例或選擇預設值，輕鬆實現物件的等比例縮小。

圓形文字標籤：為選中的文字自動添加圓形背景，完美適用於創建數字標籤等設計元素。



MultiDesign Assistant is a versatile design tool aimed at enhancing productivity for Figma users. This plugin offers four practical features:


One-click Fill and Stroke Swap: Quickly exchange the fill and stroke colors of objects, saving design time.


Quick Size Adjustment: Input specific values to instantly adjust the length and width of objects.


Proportional Scaling: Easily scale objects proportionally by entering custom ratios or selecting from preset values.


Circular Text Labels: Automatically add circular backgrounds to selected text, perfect for creating number tags and similar design elements.
plugins.tagline: Swap colors, adjust sizes, scale proportionally, add circular text backgrounds.

plugins.name: Figma To GFX
plugins.description: The FTAGFX Plugin allows users to turn Figma Objects into GFX objects! The goal is to help with faster prototyping on boards with (touch)Screens. You can select whether to make your object a touchable button, or just a static object. If you need help visit this GitHub Repository: https://github.com/Zynth9999/FigmaToAdafruit
plugins.tagline: A simple and easy way to convert Figma objects into Adafruit GFX objects!

86323.name: Figma To GFX
86323.description: The FTAGFX Plugin allows users to turn Figma Objects into GFX objects! The goal is to help with faster prototyping on boards with (touch)Screens. You can select whether to make your object a touchable button, or just a static object. If you need help visit this GitHub Repository: https://github.com/Zynth9999/FigmaToAdafruit
86323.release_notes: A new and better logo which will change with every version!
86323.tagline: A simple and easy way to convert Figma objects into Adafruit GFX objects!
